data.name: Membership1Advantages
data.value: Privileges a professional member:

data.name: Membership1Adventage1
data.value: Has the right to elect and be elected,

data.name: Membership1Adventage2
data.value: Can visit on a regular basis assemblies and presentations of the organization,

data.name: Membership1Adventage3
data.value: Can visit conferences sponsored by the organization on preferential payments,

data.name: Membership1Adventage4
data.value: Receives reports of assemblies and other messages,

data.name: Membership1Adventage5
data.value: Has the right to be elected in the board of ADAA.

data.name: Membership1Description
data.value: Professional member can become the doctor, the researcher, the licensed psychologist or other professionals having corresponding formation. The professional member gives a significant part of time to research in the field of Alzheimer’s disease. This work is directed on studying of interrelation between function of a brain and behavior. The professional member works for improvement of quality of a life of people and observes thus the maximum ethical standards.

data.name: Membership1Fee
data.value: Yearly fee: 5000AMD

data.name: Membership1Title
data.value: Professional Member

data.name: Membership2Advantages
data.value: Privileges the caregivers / the member of family:

data.name: Membership2Adventage1
data.value: Can visit on a regular basis assemblies and presentations of the organization,

data.name: Membership2Adventage2
data.value: Can visit conferences sponsored by the organization on preferential payments,

data.name: Membership2Adventage3
data.value: Receives reports of assemblies and other messages,

data.name: Membership2Adventage4
data.value: Twice an year can receive distributed АDАА bulletins and books.

data.name: Membership2Fee
data.value: Yearly fee: 2500AMD

data.name: Membership2Title
data.value: The caregiver/the member of family

data.name: Membership3Advantages
data.value: Privileges of students - member’s АDАА:

data.name: Membership3Adventage1
data.value: Can visit on a regular basis assemblies and presentations of the organization,

data.name: Membership3Adventage2
data.value: Can visit conferences sponsored by the organization on preferential payments,

data.name: Membership3Adventage3
data.value: Receives reports of assemblies and other messages,

data.name: Membership3Adventage4
data.value: Has the right to be elected in the board of ADAA,

data.name: Membership3Adventage5
data.value: Receives the certificate of member АААD.

data.name: Membership3Description
data.value: Member of Association as the student can be any person interested in problem Alzheimer who is graduated, the post-graduate student or the student on medicine, psychology and other similar areas of a science.

data.name: Membership3Fee
data.value: Yearly fee: 1000AMD

data.name: Membership3Title
data.value: Member of Association - the Student

data.name: Membership4Description
data.value: This category concerns to persons, who needs only reception of messages on assemblies AAAD and other information. They have not the right to choose or have office, or to receive discounts on sponsored by the organizations of conferences.

data.name: Membership4Fee
data.value: Yearly fee: 2000AMD

data.name: Membership4Title
data.value: Only reception of mail

data.name: Paragraph1
data.value: To have access all our serivces you can join us!

data.name: Paragraph2
data.value: Membership types

data.name: Title
data.value: Membership
